org.drip.spline.segment

Class SegmentBasisEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.spline.segment.SegmentBasisEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BasisEvaluator

    public class SegmentBasisEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
implements BasisEvaluator
    This Class implements the BasisEvaluator interface for the given set of the Segment Basis Evaluator Functions.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
